definition: (prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The new fine paper line will be taken into use in the first quarter of 2011.
sentences.chinese: 新的薄頁紙生產線將在2011年第一季度投入使用。

sentences.english: Cone Denim(Jiaxing) Ltd. is targeted to commence its production in the first quarter of 2007.
sentences.chinese: 嘉興康龍紡織計劃在2007年第一季度投入生產。

sentences.english: Partly due to the delay, its first-quarter revenue forecast is now below average estimates, according to StarMine.
sentences.chinese: 由於推遲的原因，它的第一季度收入預報低於預期。

sentences.english: The government will report first-quarter economic data on April 15.
sentences.chinese: 4月15日政府將報告第一季度經濟數據。

sentences.english: The first quarter losses compare unfavourably with last year's unhappy period.
sentences.chinese: 第一季度的虧損與去年同期比較差的不愉快的時期。

sentences.english: The news came from tonight's Q1 THQ earnings call.
sentences.chinese: 消息來自今晚THQ第一季度的收益報告。

sentences.english: Production volumes will be confirmed when Suncor's first quarter results are released.
sentences.chinese: 生產量將得到確認時，森科爾的第一季度業績公佈。

sentences.english: From the 7th volume, itbeen published in the first quarter of even year biennially.
sentences.chinese: 從第七捲開始，每兩年一卷逢雙年的第一季度發行。

sentences.english: Sales of passenger cars rose by roughly 20% in the first quarter.
sentences.chinese: 公司第一季度的乘用車銷量增幅約爲20%。

sentences.english: The following list showcases the winners in each of the categories we covered in the first quarter of 2009.
sentences.chinese: 以下是2009年第一季度的周冠軍。

sentences.english: In the first quarter , they provided 71.1 billion yuan in funding.
sentences.chinese: 今年第一季度，信託公司提供了711億元。

definition: within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
